name: bruno fabbri
text: Bought a sweet American flag belt from the Ann arbor art show. High quality and exceptional service. Why wear a Chinese made belt from Wal-Mart when you can buy a handmade American made belt for the same price that will hold up for years of tough use. Thanks again for the great handmade belt I've been wearing it proud ever since. 👍🇺🇸👍🇺🇸

name: Keller Dunnam
text: the best store with the best clothes! by far my favorite boutique!

name: Emma Brown
text: The best selection of clothes! Staff and owner have been more than accommodating every time I’ve gone in. The owner especially has been so nice and never made me feel pressured to buy anything. One of the best experiences shopping I have had. Will definitely be back!

name: Traci Billingsley
text: Great selection and prices.  Awesome staff.

name: Lacey Denton
text: The owner is amazing. She is so welcoming, she will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy with how you look and what you buy. It’s been 5 years now and she still knows my name, knows what I like and if I have a special occasion she will pull things for me to try. Best cloths, best jewelry, don’t get me started on the shoes. I can’t say enough good things. I love this store and the owner so much.

name: Serra Bilgili
text: Studio 3:19 is one of my favorites!! It's such an edgy, unique boutique! They carry the best brands in clothing, shoes, accessories, and candles. I love all the high-end leather purses and wallets. I took my boyfriend and he was pleasantly surprised about the men's selection. I'll definitely be shopping there regularly!!

name: Colin Howard
text: Great store! I use it all of the time to get gifts for my girlfriend. The owner has a great fashion sense and seems to know exactly what my girlfriend would want. She has kept me out of trouble many times with her advice. The store constantly has new arrivals so it is always worth stopping in if you're in the area or heading to downtown Opelika just to go!

name: Kathryn Thompson
text: Molly and her staff are wonderful and so accommodating! Studio 3:19 is my go-to for must haves and also a great place to shop for gifts for friends and family! Online shopping too! Great experience!

name: Blaine Tharpe
text: I enjoyed my sisits(3) . A little pricy

name: Averi
text: The staff is super sweet and are always willing to help!

name: Kristen Ferrell
text: Great selection for all sizes and figures!

name: Lisa Mccain
text: Always find that special something

resp.text: Lisa, thank you so so much. I can’t tell you how much I appreciate your support!

name: Nathan Wohleb
text: Bought some stuff for my wife.

name: LM W.
text:
Guess who arrived today!  My NEW Boo!  Meet the Dartmouth Melbourne Black Backpack 😍 (Be still my beating heart)!  Brahmin is a whole mood for me.  If Brahmin was a Gang it would be “A Blackout”!  I love Brahmin so much.  The case for my MacBook is NOT Brahmin of course (it’s cute though).  I had to get as close to it as possible (Visit the KECC Store) if you want one.

Visit the 280 store if you want AMAZING Service!  Ask for Anita, she’s my favorite!  She ordered this beauty Monday and it arrived today!  Whoop Whoop. So much room in the bag for all my personal belongings.  I dress Brahmin up and down (Sexy dress & heels or Jeans & J’s) and Brahmin is still what gets all the attention!  Treat yourself you won’t regret it!  #Classic&Cute. #GangGang.  #IssaBlackOut. #BragginOnBrahminBags.

name: Joy Elizabeth
text: Had to wait outside the store about 5 minutes until some customers left... its a 4 person limit at the moment, which is understandable, there was only one person working and the space isn't that big. Lovely selection of Brahmins, I got what I came for & it was on sale, even better! Sales rep was okay 🤷🏾‍♀️

name: Tiffany Covington
text:
My experience started before the boutique!  April
The sales person answered the phone.... I explained it was my mother in law birthday. I had a lot going on and I wasn’t able to order her bag in time. April then begin to engage me in conversation and ask me about the particular bag unfortunately they didn’t have in the store but she gave me several options. We finally figured out a particular bag. I walked into the store and ask for her in particular she greeted me with a smile we looked around I looked at the different bags I change the bag she was so patient so warm so fuzzy professional not only did I leave out of there with a bag from my mother-in-law but I left out with one for myself. I will definitely continue to be Aprils customer!! Thank you for the exceptional experience!’n

name: Edie Duffey
text: The absolute worst experience I have ever had regarding customer experience especially with a high end item.  The manager of the store talk to me like I was stupid and ignorant. The previous experience with this store had been exceptional. I have no idea what this manager was thinking and what she was trying to convey. Very unprofessional and customer focused.

name: Perry Live Tv
text: I walked up to the door at the Summit and it was locked a sales persone was standing right there when i pulled on the door as i walked away thats when she came and said i had to make and appointment as i walked away she gone say i can come in i said no thank you i will do my shopping online from now on...

name: Katrice Martin
text: Very good service very professional nice store clean store.

name: Andrea Howell
text: Love their handbags!

name: Lynn Williams
text: Heaven, I was in Heaven. Brahmin, Brahmin everywhere

name: Lisa Mccord
text: Very friendly customer service was excellent the manager was wonderful brought me several different handbags of the color I wanted to choose from even some of the same style and I thought that was very stop thoughtful

name: Chell Brown
text: It don't matter  who is working, everyone  greets me with a smile and kindness. Nice people and great customer  service.

name: Daniel Ransom
text: It was great the salesperson was very helpful

name: Larry Clark
text: They give me great service everytime

name: Karen Bell
text: Love brahmin bags. Have always had good experience at this store. Salesladies have always been very nice and helpful.

name: Anita Stevenson
text: Very good selection and an awesome clearance section

name: madyson vlogs and eats
text: Tasha my salesperson is always helpful and keeps me informed on specials and new arrivals and the other workers are also helpful sweet attitudes Great Job Ladies.I love me a Brahmin!!!

name: Lois White
text: I love it, nice friendly people.

name: Ivory Lee
text: My new favorite store.

name: Arthurlyn Upshaw
text: A lot to choose from ladies make sure you have plenty of money you ate guaranteed to fall in love.

name: Jamaica Fuller
text: My experience was great!

name: Tiger Dog 91
text: This place is crowded....

name: Sheryl Daniels
text: A little piece of heaven!!!!

name: Tonisha Ervin
text: Just had a bad experience...returned merchandise....won't shop at this store again

name: Manderia Silmon
text: Good service

name: Jerry Allison
text: Very large and nice store, friendly and helpful staff, plus various in store workshops to attend.

name: jettt111
text: Joseph made me a ostrich skin wallet for my friends birthday and Christmas present. He did it lightning quick and it is one of a kind. It is amazing looking .I like it so much I’m getting him to make a wallet for me that will hold my retirement police badge. You can’t go wrong using him.

name: Ashley Pattillo
text: The customer service was amazing!! Prices are great and selection is wonderful!!

name: braden watkins
text: Staff really knows their stuff, was able to be in and out very quickly on my lunch break. Store is spotless and everything is arranged in a logical easy to understand way.

name: James Harris
text: Very clean store with cool workers.

name: Elizabeth Beck
text: This was the second time I’ve brought some belts to work on in the the store. They are always so willing to help and don’t care if you stay all day. Seriously, worth the drive to go to this store.

name: Jeremy Butler
text: Great selection and helpful staff once you get them. They will spend time with you but if woth someone else you will be waiting a few minutes.

name: Josie Prado
text: The good people at Tandy Leather taught me how to change the snaps on a favorite pair of shoes and declined payment for either the snaps or their expertise. I am impressed and grateful. Thank you!

name: Nancy Kramer
text:
I haven't been working with leather for very long but every time I've been to the store it has been clean, well organized and the product selection is great.  The staff are extremely pleasant and helpful.  They take the time to answer my questions and help me choose the right leather and accessories for my projects since I'm still learning.

I took one of the beginner classes they offer and it helped my leather work improve greatly.  Matt, who was my instructor, was awesome and I learned so much from his class.  They offer several different other leather classes and I plan on coming back and taking some more.  If you want to learn about making things out of leather this is the place to go.

name: Jill B (Zalphinian)
text:
The prices on the leather were very good, the site was clean, and the prices on tools and kits weren't bad. The staff were poliet but standoffish.

Now for the reason my review is so low. I was here shopping with my two roommates. One of them who is make went up to pay for an item, and I was right beside him waiting to pay for my item once he paid for his. The clerk finished my roommates transaction, I set my item on the counter to be rung up, and the clerk just walked away. Not long after that he and the other clerk walked outside via the back door.

At that point I was tempted to just take my item and walk out the door. What I ended up doing was just leaving it on the counter and walking out of the store.

I have no idea why the clerk ignored me and my item. Part of me wonders if it's because I'm female and he didn't think I could possible be purchasing anything. It could also be that he was just about to go on a smoke break and couldn't be bothered to handle one more customer. There are so many possibilities, and all I can do is guess. No matter what the reason, it was still just a very upsetting experience.

name: John Higginbotham
text: This place is amazing the when looking for your leather and accessories. I was amazed by the amount of help some of the staff give me each time I visited.

name: Matt Adamczyk
text:
I placed an online order that I needed very urgently, they called to confirm that shipping was supposed to be next-day.  I said yes I do and explained the emergency.
They sent the package 2-day anyways.  When I called to let them know, there was no apology whatsoever.  I realize it was too late to fix the situation when I called, but no one even said they are sorry for the issue.
Now I have 20 homeless people being bussed to my location tomorrow to learn leathercraft and I have no thread.

resp.text: We deeply apologize this happened. This is not how we treat our customers. Please email us at social@tandyleather.com so we can make this right for you.

name: Lori Earle
text: These people are wonderful. I didn't know anything about leather the first day I walked in there. I'm working on a multi-media piece of art and wanted to incorporate leather and they have held my hand the whole way. They are so knowledgeable and so genuinely kind which you don't really find much any more.

name: Brad Harris
text:
You won't find a greater group of folks to help you with your leather needs. Very knowledgeable without the attitude no matter your skill level.

I started my leather journey here and the entire time they are there to help me out when I need an expert opinion or tip.

If you're interested in starting leathercraft, you couldn't ask for a better place to start YOUR journey.

name: William Kissinger
text: Excellent product inventory.  Knowledgeable, helpful staff. Super fast online order processing and shipping. Placed an online order Tuesday am and recieved order Wednesday pm...... can't beat that service!

name: Gottfried Kibelka
text: I researched the internet for quite a while but Tandy Leather is The place to go. The staff is very helpful and will spend 30 min looking for a perfect leather cord with you or go through their inventory of hides. Beginner or professional, they most likely have what you need and will provide tips if you ask.

name: Jimmie Burnett
text: Very helpful people and the store has everything you need. Love to have one in Chattanooga.

name: Chad Polito
text: Extremely educated place you do not ever need to stop by any kind of hobby store for leather stuff these people will help you with anything. Really looking forward to taking class on Thursday

resp.text: Thank you Chad for your feedback!

name: Shivakumar
text: Excellent

name: Bob Fish
text: Love in Pensacola, so I have to call and order my items over the phone.  On every ordering occasion I have had nothing but great service and the best quality merchandise on the market.

name: Lisa Minor-Burnside
text: The store manager is very kind and helpful. We have received good service  and assistance here for the last 3 years!

name: Brandi Holland-Adams
text: Awesome store! Great staff and welcoming environment.

name: John McClure
text: Very helpful and was they were able to answer my leather care question and provided the right product.

name: Donna Colvard
text: Guys were so helpful for beginners. Great service and huge selection! Would highly recommend this location.

name: Craig Viera
text: Always have a great time. They (Matt & Zack and the guys) know their business and treat everyone like old friends.

name: Isem Perdue
text: Great selection, everything I was looking for, manager could not have been more helpful. Very friendly atmosphere.

name: M Marlow
text: Great selection of leather and leather craft tools at reasonable prices.

name: Lois Kimbrough
text: The staff at the Tandy Leather Company Store were very knowledgeable and helpful with the things that we needed and I would return to that store for the next leather goods project that I need.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review.

name: Dixie Anderson
text: Great products and helpful, knowledgeable staff.

name: Jeremy Qualls
text: The friendliest staff.

name: tyler townsend
text: Excellent customer service and knowledge of the products

name: David Cunningham
text: Very helpful and informative.

resp.text: Thank you David for your feedback and for being a great customer!

name: Christopher Meadows
text: Very helpful

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review.

name: Donald Geddings
text: Love the Tandy stores

name: Cyndi LaFond
text: Great staff

name: Abby L. Abbott
text: Loved it!! I joined!!

resp.text: Yay! Thank you Abby for your feedback and for being a Tandy customer

name: Bro. George Smith
text: Always helpful.

name: Dustin Balch
text: Ok. The ladies who work at this location are the absolute best! They have always been extremely helpful when I need something for my wife. They also just helped me pull off a huge surprise for her birthday. I cannot say enough good things about them.

name: Lacey Graves
text: I arrived at this location at 6:02 in a Friday evening and their sign said they closed at 6pm. Not very good business hours for a Friday evening and how can they cater to the working woman? There was another customer inside and the doors we locked. I stood at the door and an associate finally came.  I explained I knew exactly what Iwas looking for.  A ring that was sold out online in my size.  I drove all the way from Decatur in hopes to find it.  I shared this and she said she couldn't let me in the store as they could only be open for so many hours. What does that even mean?  There was still a customer inside.  She closed the door on me and I was extremely disappointed. I am a long time customer of Brighton from Florida that just moved to the area.  I was happy to know there was a store close enough I could still spoil myself at.  I also work for a major retailer who does not close their doors till 15 minutes AFTER their posted hours.  Very poor customer service when retailers are struggling these days.  I will not revisit this location.  They have lost my future business.  I hope Brighton and the associates consider what customer service is to them, bending the rules just a little isn't bad for business.

name: Sandra Williams
text: What's not to love? This is a great store the ladies are ALWAYS so helpful and informative.

name: Mary Ellen Bridges
text: Lovely staff! Very friendly & helpful. Made shopping a happy experience!

name: Mary Smith
text: Clean and masked!  Felt most comfortable with my visit.  Product is great!!!!

name: Elizabeth Henson
text: The sales people here are so nice, patient, and not pushy. I love this store and all the jewelry choices. I would love a purse or wallet but they are a little out of my price range!

name: Heather Rice
text: Ive had a turtle keychain from there that i love so much and ill probably keep forever. When its hot outside they offer you bottles of water when you come in their store. Thats a very nice thing for them to do. They greet u as soon as u walk in and tell you about the things u are looking at as you walk around the store. I love brighton items!

name: Kyla Guice
text: Love the people who work here!

name: mark roller
text: Found great gift

name: latoo21
text: The nicest ladies work here! No pressure, beautiful jewelery and hand bags.

name: Donnette Putman
text: Didn't have much to look at that I needed.

name: Yolanda B
text: Great sale , friendly  staff

name: Diana Bullard
text: Poor customer service.
